doc.title: Peaceful Measures
doc.plot: Filmed in post-war Iraq, a group of American musicians and dancers travel to the tumultuous region to teach music and dance to Iraqi artists over an eight-day intensive workshop followed by a two-day gala concert. From Beethoven to break-dancing, Sunni and Shiite come together in a rare moment of unity to encourage peace and cultural solidarity in a region where artists have been forced to suppress their talents due to war, a lack of resources, and absent a cultural forum for expression.
